18 } UART_SLEEP_MODE_T;

20 // Used for waking the CC out of deep sleep mode.
21 #define UART_DEFAULT_WAKE_WAIT (7)
22 #define UART_DEFAULT_SEND_WAIT (13)

118 
119 public:
120  // To work on bean, the serial must be initialized
121  // at 57600 with standard settings, and cannot be disabled
122  // or all control messaging will break. We've overidden begin() and end()
123  // functions to not do a whole heck of a lot as a result.
124  void begin(void);
125  virtual void begin(unsigned long ignored){
126  // Do nothing.
127  // We're overiding what users can do here.
128  }
129  virtual void begin(unsigned long ignored, uint8_t also_ignored){
130  // Do nothing.
131  // We're overiding what users can do here.
132  }
133  virtual void end(){
134  // Do nothing. Users ending serial would break our control messaging
135  // so we're removing this ability.
136  }
137 
138  virtual void flush(void);
139 
140  virtual size_t write(uint8_t);
141  size_t write(const uint8_t *buffer, size_t size);
142 
143  using HardwareSerial::write; // pull in write(str) and write(buf, size) from Print
144  virtual size_t print(const String &s);
145  size_t print(const __FlashStringHelper *ifsh);
146  using Print::print;
147 
148  //Debug
149  bool debugLoopbackVerify(const uint8_t *message, const size_t size);
150  bool debugEndToEndLoopbackVerify(const uint8_t *message, const size_t size);
151  int debugGetDebugCounter(int *counter);
152  void debugWrite(const char c){ HardwareSerial::write((uint8_t)c);};
153  void debugLoopBackFullSerialMessages(void);
154  void debugWritePtm(const uint8_t *message, const size_t size);

156 
157  // constructor
158  BeanSerialTransport(ring_buffer *rx_buffer, ring_buffer *tx_buffer,
159  volatile uint8_t *ubrrh, volatile uint8_t *ubrrl,
160  volatile uint8_t *ucsra, volatile uint8_t *ucsrb,
161  volatile uint8_t *ucsrc, volatile uint8_t *udr,
162  uint8_t rxen, uint8_t txen, uint8_t rxcie,
163  uint8_t udrie, uint8_t u2x, ring_buffer* reply_buffer,
164  volatile bool* message_complete)
165  : HardwareSerial(rx_buffer, tx_buffer, ubrrh, ubrrl,
166  ucsra, ucsrb, ucsrc, udr, rxen, txen,
167  rxcie, udrie, u2x)
168  {
169  _reply_buffer = reply_buffer;
170  _message_complete = message_complete;
171  *message_complete = false;
172  m_wakeDelay = UART_DEFAULT_WAKE_WAIT;
173  m_enforcedDelay = UART_DEFAULT_SEND_WAIT;
174  }; // End constructor
175 
176 }; // End BeanSerialTransport
